summary.span: 自动生成用于协调对 的更改与关联的数据源的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不 会自动生成对 与数据源关联的更改进行协调所需的 SQL 语句。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a associated with the data source. 但是，您可以通过设置的属性，创建一个 为单表更新生成 SQL 语句的对象 。However, you can create an object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the property of the . 然后，将 生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句。The then generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set. 与其对应的之间的关系 始终为一对一关系。The relationship between an and its corresponding is always one-to-one. 若要创建此函件，请设置 对象的属性 。To create this correspondence, you set the property of the object. 这会导致将 自身注册为侦听器，这会生成 影响的事件的输出 。This causes the to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of events that affect the . 若要生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，请 使用 属性来检索所需的一组元数据。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata. 如果在 检索元数据后更改的值（例如，在第一次更新之后），则应调用 方法来更新元数据。If you change the value of after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should then call the method to update the metadata. > [!NOTE] > 如果分配给属性的 SELECT 语句 使用别名列名称，则生成的 INSERT、UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句可能不准确或失败。If the SELECT statement assigned to the property uses aliased column names, the resulting INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements may be inaccurate or fail. 如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序不能为别名列名称提供适当的基本列名称 (使用 SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME 值 `SQLColAttribute`) ，则可以在生成的 INSERT、UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句中使用该别名。If the underlying ODBC driver cannot provide the appropriate base column name for the alias column name (using the SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME value of `SQLColAttribute`), the alias name could be used in the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements. 例如，用于 Oracle 的 Microsoft ODBC 驱动程序返回别名作为基列名称。For example, the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle returns the alias name as the base column name. 因此，生成的 INSERT、UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句将导致错误。Therefore, the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements would cause errors. 还使用引用的 、 和 属性 。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 如果修改了其中一个或多个属性，则用户应调用，如果属性本身的值已更改，则应调用 。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the value of the property itself is changed. 否则 ，、 和 属性将保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用 ，将 从解除关联 ，并且不再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和和 来从数据源中选择行。The following example uses , together with and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例传递了一个已初始化的 、一个连接字符串、一个 SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串和一个作为数据源表名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 然后，该示例创建一个 。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 自身注册为 在此属性中指定的生成的事件侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 当你创建的新实例时 ， 将释放与此关联的任何现有 。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

span.span: An object that is associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 自身注册为 在此属性中指定的生成的事件侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 当你创建的新实例时 ， 将释放与此关联的任何现有 。When you create a new instance of , any existing associated with this is released.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As OdbcCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆盖的任何现有参数信息 。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要对数据源进行额外的调用以获取信息。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果事先知道了参数信息，则通过显式设置信息更有效地填充参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 只能 与存储过程一起使用。You can only use with stored procedures. 不能使用 来填充 任意 transact-sql 语句，如参数化 SELECT 语句。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.

exception.span: 基础 ODBC 驱动程序不支持返回存储过程参数信息，或者命令文本不是有效的存储过程名称，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying ODBC driver does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, or the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法来进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在上显式设置该值 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后， 如果以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首先生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
If , generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法来进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在上显式设置该值 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后， 如果以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首先生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 参数传递，可以强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已 指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

span.span: Generating Commands with CommandBuilders

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法来进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回 要执行的对象。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在上显式设置该值 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后， 如果以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首先生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 参数传递，可以强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已 指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

public: System::String ^ QuoteIdentifier(System::String ^ unquotedIdentifier, System::Data::Odbc::OdbcConnection ^ connection);

param.name: unquotedIdentifier
param.span: 不带引号的原始标识符。

span.span: The original unquoted identifier.

param.name: connection
param.span: 当连接是通过时，会导致托管包装从获取 ODBC 驱动程序的引号字符，调用 SQLGetInfo （SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR）。

span.span: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the ODBC driver, calling SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR).

param.span: 如果连接未通过时，使用从 和 的值中引用该字符串。

span.span: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from and .

summary.span: 获取或设置使用其名称包含空格或保留标记等字符的数据库对象（例如，表或列）时使用的开始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when working with database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The beginning character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ QuoteSuffix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置使用其名称包含空格或保留标记等字符的数据库对象（例如，表或列）时使用的结束字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when working with database objects, (for example, tables or columns), whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The ending character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.
